author: Staff Reporter
text:
Principal District Judge S. Ramathilagam postponed the hearing of bail application of S. Yuvaraj, the prime accused in the murder of Dalit youth V. Gokulraj, to January 19 here on Tuesday.

When the ail petition came up for hearing,

Yuvaraj’s lawyer wanted bail to be given. But prosecutor Ramesh sought time from the judge who postponed the hearing.

This is the second time that Yuvaraj moved bail petition in the court.Presently, he was lodged at Vellore Central Prison.
title: Yuvaraj bail plea hearing postponed
